<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Crown of the Fire Eater](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1435)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A wreath of flames dances around the rim of this golden crown. You gain resistance 5 to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72).

<document level="2" id="action-1083" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Crown of the Fire Eater
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Crown of the Fire Eater (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The constant fire resistance is 10. When activated, the fire resistance and maximum number of Hit Points regained are each 25.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Crown of the Fire Eater (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 110</row>

**Price** 10,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The constant fire resistance is 15. When activated, the fire resistance and maximum number of Hit Points regained are each 35.
name: Crown of the Fire Eater (Major)
